content:
published in coats & clark s o n t book no 304 *kitchen crochet featuring speed-cro-sheen * in 1954
**thread ** coats & clark s o n t speed-cro-sheen mercerized cotton art c 44 * 2 balls no 12-a blue sparkle * 2 balls no 126 spanish red **other materials ** * milward s steel crochet hook no 2/0 double zero * 140 bone rings 1 inch in diameter
